participant_1.background:
I saw a blue whale when I went to the aquarium.
last month the farm was foreclosed so i am looking for a new job.
I am a very private person and do not discuss my family.
i am a simple man.
My family is very supportive of my sleep schedule and my need for exercise.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy my bike rides with some tunes in my ears.
I do not currently own a home, but I am looking forward to one day having a larp room in my own space.
My dog is a huge source of inspiration and happiness for me, especially when I'm feeling down.
i enjoy taking walks.
My parents are not supportive of my singing because they want me to have a stable career.

content.text: Hi there! How is your day going?
It's going well! Just found a blue whale at the aquarium.
Oh wow! That's so cool! I've never seen a blue whale in real life.
It was amazing! I also went on a bike ride with some tunes in my ears.
I love bike rides! I usually go on walks with my dog, but I'd love to get into biking more.
What kind of dog do you have?
I have a goldendoodle named Bailey. She's the sweetest dog ever!
I love goldendoodles! They're so cute and fluffy.
They really are! Bailey is the best dog ever.
I'm glad you have such a great dog to keep you company.
Thanks! She's the best. How are your parents doing?
They're good! They're very supportive of my sleep schedule and my need for exercise.
That's great! My parents are not always supportive of my singing because they want me to have a stable career.
I'm sorry to hear that. It's important to follow your dreams, even if your parents don't support them.
Thanks! I'm trying my best to do that.
Good for you! I'm sure you'll be successful.
